mapper.select: select A.*, B.username, C.title as thing_title, D.order_number, E.username as admin_name from b_complaint as A left join b_user as B on (A.user_id=B.id) left join b_thing as C on (A.thing_id=C.id) left join b_order as D on (A.order_id=D.id) left join b_user as E on (A.admin_id=E.id) order by A.create_time desc;

select A.*, B.username, C.title as thing_title, D.order_number, E.username as admin_name from b_complaint as A left join b_user as B on (A.user_id=B.id) left join b_thing as C on (A.thing_id=C.id) left join b_order as D on (A.order_id=D.id) left join b_user as E on (A.admin_id=E.id) where A.user_id=#{userId} order by A.create_time desc;

select A.*, B.username, C.title as thing_title, D.order_number, E.username as admin_name from b_complaint as A left join b_user as B on (A.user_id=B.id) left join b_thing as C on (A.thing_id=C.id) left join b_order as D on (A.order_id=D.id) left join b_user as E on (A.admin_id=E.id) where A.status=#{status} order by A.create_time desc;

select A.*, B.username, C.title as thing_title, D.order_number, E.username as admin_name from b_complaint as A left join b_user as B on (A.user_id=B.id) left join b_thing as C on (A.thing_id=C.id) left join b_order as D on (A.order_id=D.id) left join b_user as E on (A.admin_id=E.id) where A.type=#{type} order by A.create_time desc;
